name: The Colonists (itch)
description:
You are the island.  They are coming for your resources.

The Basics:

  • Use the mouse to drag the viewport and zoom in/out
  • Resources are your life.  The colonists will arrive and take them.
  • Click on colonists to spend Spirit to attack.  Spirit recharges over time.
  • Max out your Rage for a special ability.
  • You win when the colonist Fear meter is maxed out.

When you click a...

  • Colonist: Spend spirit to strike them with lightning
  • Ship: Spend spirit to sink them
  • Colony: Spend spirit to create a storm that blocks new worker creation and potentially starts a fire.
  • Gold Mines: Spend spirit to curse the gold.  If a worker takes home cursed gold, the settlement will be destroyed.
  • Totems: Quickly restores your Spirit for a limited time
  • Temples: Spend spirit to increase the rate in which you gain Rage

Tips:

  • Build your rage by keeping your temples active.  Once it maxes out, you'll unleash your fury.
  • Protect your totems and temples - they offer important gifts!
  • Keep the colonists from getting out of control
